author: Special Correspondent
text:
Workers of the Communist Party of India (CPI) staged a demonstration here on Saturday demanding justice to Udamalpet honour killing victim Sankar and his family.

Party district secretary R. Thirugnanam led the demo in which a large number of workers participated and raised slogans denouncing the killing of Sankar, demanding justice to the victim’s family, and demanding immediate action against the culprits to end honour killings in the State.
title: CPI demands justice for slain dalit youth’s parents
